text: Hey All!  Has anyone ever tried to update the meta-data for the blog author pages?  Our SEO is flagging that all the authors have the same meta data and I cannot figure out how to render it dynamically.

I noticed that using a HubL comment within the module.js area of a Custom Module shows the text greyed out and italic as if it were going be interpreted as a comment, but on the frontend it actually keeps that text in the Javascript which obviously isn't valid. This is pretty misleading since doing the same thing in the HTML + HubL area properly treats that as a HubL Comment and omits it from the frontend. Can this be corrected so any HubL comments within the module.js area is treated the same way and doesn't render on the frontend or is it possible for the syntax formatting to be adjusted so it doesn't make it look like it will be treated as a comment? I'm not sure if this is a recent issue or if it has been this way forever.
Hi everyone I need help storing unique values for a HubDB column into an array and getting the length of that array

Hello, I would like to ask about automatic image resizing. Should this url <https://cdn2.HubSpot.net/hub/211045/file-377800313-jpg/IMG_4134.jpg?width=600&height=500&name=IMG_4134.jpg> should change the size of this image?
